TopicTitle: 1.0.4 Compatible!!! Two Amphibious Rovers *Elcano Challenge Compatible*

Articles.Content:
**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹A New Breed Of Amphibious Rovers**

**AeroSpace MR-Dasher**

![I7Yb8W0.png](http://i.imgur.com/I7Yb8W0.png)

**Details:** **** 

**Download:** [https://www.dropbox.com/s/y8n2r27wxud10js/AeroSpace%20MR-Dasher.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/y8n2r27wxud10js/AeroSpace%20MR-Dasher.craft?dl=0)

- **Ã¢â‚¬â€¹****Speed on land: 150 meters per second**
- **Speed on Water: around 80 to 120 meters per second \*Note safe speed is 80 meters or lower\***
- **Liquid Fuel: 504**
- **Specs:** **Two Goo Canisters, two surface scanning devices, two coms, one basic jet engine, 1 mk1 incline cockpit, plenty of electricity and radioactive isotopes**

**AeroSpace MR-Beast**

![ikAG313.png](http://i.imgur.com/ikAG313.png)

**Details:**

**Download:**[**https://www.dropbox.com/s/e1sbrk2urx5bgw9/AeroSpace%20MR-Beast.craft?dl=0**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/e1sbrk2urx5bgw9/AeroSpace%20MR-Beast.craft?dl=0)

- **Speed on land: 130 meters per second**
- **Speed on Water: Maximum 59.4 meters per second**
- **Liquid fuel: 504**
- **Specs: Same as the Dasher however, it has more mass because it comes with two drills, two ore cans, and an ISRU converter to convert ore into liquid fuel ideal for the Elcano challenge. \*Im thinking of entering it** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)**\* It can refuel on its own**

**Quick Trip to Abandoned Runway**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-31T18:38:59Z" title="07/31/2015 06:38  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 31, 2015</time> by ghostbuzzer7**
Got myself a Beast - I've been wanting to circumnavigate Kerbin for a while now.
The rovers look great! Great design!

> 
> Got myself a Beast - I've been wanting to circumnavigate Kerbin for a while now.

Good luck out there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Try not to exceed speed limit or the kraken may return (And watch out for glitchy terain going down equator-ish

> 
> The rovers look great! Great design!

Should be 1.0.4 compatible. Im going to get them again and make sure they do. Dont think SQUAD has intentions to change water... I wish they added boat parts etc for stage recovery missions ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

UPDATE:

Both crafts do work on land and water ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). Relatively the same status as said above but now you can 4xs warp and everything should be good. Just dont press the Q or E or you will roll the ship upside down and.... you get the memo. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Happy sailing

UPDATE OF AN UPDATE:

New video should be up shortly. It is to show you how fast the dasher travels and fuel efficient it is across the poles. I think it only took like 11 mins of recording while at 4xs speed. Timelapse coming soon ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
